items.title: GeForce Garage - Summer of RTX Community Build

ai.summary: Based on the available description… NVIDIA's GeForce Garage video announces the winner of the Summer of RTX r/buildapc Community Build: u/JeffersonPutnam, who built a small-form-factor GeForce RTX 5090 rig. The description lists full system specs (Fractal Design Era 2, RTX 5090 Founders Edition, MSI MPG B850I Edge, Ryzen 7 9800X3D, 32GB DDR5-6000, Corsair SF1000, Corsair Nautilus 240 RS) and links to the PCPartPicker build and GeForce social channels.
bullets: Winner: u/JeffersonPutnam — SFF GeForce RTX 5090 build featured by GeForce Garage.
Key components: Fractal Design Era 2, RTX 5090 Founders Edition, MSI MPG B850I Edge, Ryzen 7 9800X3D, 32GB DDR5-6000.
Power and cooling: Corsair SF1000 PSU and Corsair Nautilus 240 RS AIO listed.
PCPartPicker link provided for the complete parts list.
GeForce host credited (Dwight) and official GeForce social links included.
takeaways: Showcases integration of a top-tier consumer GPU (RTX 5090) into a small-form-factor chassis, highlighting form-factor and compatibility considerations for dense deployments.
The build pairs a high-capacity SFX power supply (Corsair SF1000) with a 240mm AIO, underscoring the power and cooling needs when deploying high-performance GPUs in compact systems.
Use of a mini-ITX motherboard (MSI MPG B850I Edge) and a high-performance CPU (Ryzen 7 9800X3D) indicates trends toward powerful, space-efficient endpoints—relevant for edge or compact rack planning.

items.title: Cloud Cost Efficiency I The Keys to AWS Optimization | S16 E2

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this livestream examines the key KPIs that drive AWS cost efficiency—such as cost per transaction, resource utilization rates, and ROI calculations—and how to measure and track them. It also covers practical benchmarking, spotting cost-optimization opportunities, and building dashboards to communicate value to stakeholders.
bullets: Focus on KPIs: cost per transaction, utilization rates, and ROI.
Practical methods to measure, track, and optimize AWS spending.
Frameworks for benchmarking cloud efficiency and prioritizing efforts.
Guidance on identifying concrete cost optimization opportunities.
Building dashboards to translate technical metrics into stakeholder value.
takeaways: Track cost-per-transaction and utilization to identify workloads for right‑sizing or migration.
Use ROI calculations to align cloud investments with business outcomes and justify changes.
Benchmarking helps prioritize optimization efforts where savings and performance gains are largest.
Dashboards that communicate clear metrics are essential to secure stakeholder buy‑in for cost initiatives.
